General.Name: Arabian Contracting Services Company CJSC
General.Description: Arabian Contracting Services Company, together with its subsidiaries, engages in printing business in Saudi Arabia and Egypt. It operates through Printing, Advertising, and Electronic Sales segments. The company prints books, advertisements, advertisement materials, commercial stationery papers and invoices, and posters and flyers; retails electronic products through mails; constructs residential buildings, roads, streets, sidewalks, pouring bases, and foundations, as well as bridges, tunnels, railways; indoor and outdoor advertisement activities; publicity and advertisement entities and agencies activities; and lays electrical and communication wires. It is also involved in commercial printing and binding; gravure and photo engraving on metal or plastic boards; wholesale of gifts and luxuries; and organizing/managing exhibitions and conferences. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
